select_option: Select the option you would like to perform.
discordpanel_help: Start DiscordPanel in your default browser.
desktop_panel_help: Start the Desktop app of DiscordPanel.
update_help: Update DiscordPanel to the latest available version.
go_back_help: Go back to the selection panel.
discord_help: Open the Discord support server link on your default browser.
issue_help: Submit a Issue/Bug Report/Suggestion through GitHub.
check_installation: Check if you have installed DiscordPanel correctly.
updating_failure: Unable to update DiscordPanel, error while updating DiscordPanel.
check_repo_download_method: Clone the Repository and try again.
